rooms.description: You are outside a cave, which is to your north. There may be treasure inside--you should bring it back here and use it to live happily ever after. Some supplies are on the ground, including a torch.

uses.description: You use the treasure to live happily ever after.

rooms.description: It is dark, you might be eaten by a grue.

uses.description: You light the torch. Now you can see!

rooms.description: You can see that the cave turns to the west, or you can go back south to the entrance.
There treasure in front of you, ready for the taking! You can go back to the east
You search for an exit in the dark... but are eaten by a grue!
You've found the treasure! You are rich!
